explains: n. 不适，不安；不便之处

sentences.en: She hears the discomfort in his voice.
sentences.cn: 她听出他声音里的不安。

sentences.en: Steve had some discomfort, but no real pain.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫有些不舒服，但不真疼。

sentences.en: He sings with the strained discomfort of someone whose voice hasn't quite broken.
sentences.cn: 他紧张不适地唱着, 嗓音像个还未完全变声的人。
